options.content: The stats dashboard is undergoing some maintance. Please check back later.

• Lotus Docs
  • Community

targets.query: SELECT sum("value") FROM "chain.election" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($blockInterval), "miner" fill(null)
SELECT TRIPLE_EXPONENTIAL_MOVING_AVERAGE(sum("value"), 40) FROM "chain.election" WHERE  $timeFilter -$blockInterval*40 AND time < now() - $blockInterval*3 GROUP BY time($blockInterval) fill(0)
SELECT difference(mean("value")) FROM "chain.blocktime" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT sum("value") FROM "chain.power" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(25s)
SELECT "value" FROM "chain.message_count" WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT difference("value") FROM "chain.blocktime" WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT top("value", "miner", 20) as "power" FROM "chain.miner_power" WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT mean("value") FROM "chain.miner_power" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "miner" fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "chain.miner_power" WHERE $timeFilter AND value >  1125899906842624 GROUP BY time($__interval), "miner" fill(null)
SELECT "value", "tipset" FROM "chain.height" WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT max("value") FROM "chain.gas_limit_total" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($blockInterval) fill(null)
SELECT max("value") FROM "chain.gas_used_total" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($blockInterval) fill(null)
SELECT max("value") FROM "chain.gas_limit_total" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($blockInterval) fill(null)
SELECT count("value") FROM "chain.miner_power" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT sum("value") FROM "chain.message_count" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($blockInterval), "method", "exitcode", "actor" fill(null)
SELECT mean("value")*1000000 FROM "chain.basefee" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($blockInterval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "chain.basefee" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($blockInterval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value")*24000000 FROM "chain.basefee" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($blockInterval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value")*56000000 FROM "chain.basefee" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($blockInterval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value")*940000000 FROM "chain.basefee" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($blockInterval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value")*580000000 FROM "chain.basefee" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($blockInterval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value")*380000000 FROM "chain.basefee" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($blockInterval) fill(null)
